request.lesson_description: Understanding cell parts: Exploring the structure and function of organelles including nucleus, mitochondria, ribosomes, and more.
request.learning_standard: NGSS MS-LS1-2: Develop and use a model to describe the function of a cell as a whole and ways parts of cells contribute to the function.

response.title: Understanding Cell Parts: Structure and Function of Organelles
